scripts.pub: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish patch --yes --force-publish --exact --no-changelog
scripts.pub:minor: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish minor --yes --force-publish --exact --no-changelog
scripts.pub:major: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish major --yes --force-publish --exact --no-changelog
scripts.pub:premajor: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish premajor --force-publish --exact --dist-tag beta --preid beta --no-changelog
scripts.pub:preminor: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish preminor --force-publish --exact --dist-tag beta --preid beta --no-changelog
scripts.pub:prepatch: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish prepatch --force-publish --exact --dist-tag beta --preid beta --no-changelog
scripts.pub:prerelease: npm run watchdog:build && lerna publish prerelease --yes --force-publish --exact --dist-tag beta --preid beta --no-changelog
